comment: ***Had him for ME3101*** He is a great professor! Very caring to his students and a well spoken professor. The final project, my group mates did not preform to standard in the slightest, I went to him and he was incredibly understanding of the whole situation. Would definitely take again. Dr. Aphale is great, would definitely recommend!

Ashish Aphale is very nice and is always willing to help you understand problems. He cares tremendously about making sure everyone knows what's going on. Be prepared to put in the work for a good grade. I would absolutely take him again!

Well balanced between HW, quizzes and tests. If you do and understand the HW you shouldn't struggle on the quizzes or tests. Quizzes and tests are open note but don't expect that to let you off the for not doing or chegging the HW. Relying on notes for quizzes and tests, you will run out of time searching through notes.
Absolutely fantastic professor. He explains everything, walks through examples thoroughly, and goes the extra mile to make sure his students understand everything.

Great professor, had him for heat lab. kind of an easy A because he's very caring and does not give overload work. My only Con is that the lab report is done by only you instead of group work like other labs but it is nothing impossible
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Aphale was excellent for Heat Transfer & Thermo Lab! I'd recommend him for any class that he teaches. Extremely knowledgeable but still approachable. 8 labs and 6 quizzes. Quizzes were easy (10 MC) and labs were pretty straightforward. He was very open about answering questions and lenient on deadlines. Great professor!
